title: Is python required for sem-3?
content: Tbh idk python, I have completely forgotten the basics of python. For DSA in sem-3 should I start learning it again.

comments.body: In College, they teach DSA using C.
Not necessary, because DSA is taught in C in college. But you are free to explore DSA using Python / C++ / java or any language of your choice.
Might need a bit for sds but not for dsa

You'll need it for statistics for data science, and I'm sure plenty of other applications in your life. You're learning for life mate, you're still in the JEE mindset. You gotta come out of it. Done study only for the exam. You will forget concepts ofc but you should be in a position to read documentation and immediately pick it back up. You should be in a position to look at a problem and say 'ah, that's best solved with Python'
